item.title: King Lear
item.description: This month I am mostly interested in art and Shakespeare. The Royal Academy’s annual Summer Exhibition on TV has inspired me to get back to my roots and get messy. Then seeing the RSC performance of King Lear reminds me of how much I love to watch Shakespeare’s plays performed live on stage. Much Ado About Nothing is next, on an outdoor stage at Stafford Castle, always a treat. We are going on the last night to experience all the fireworks and fun.
item.dc:creator: Leigh Scott

item.title: A Modern Classic
item.description: The new Ducati 1098 is available now. A fantastic looking bike and perhaps another design classic from Ducati. It’s the replacement for the ‘not so popular’ 999 and to regain it’s appeal has similar features to the 916 range of bikes produced between 1994 and 2002. I want one, but they ain’t cheap, especially the 1098 S Tricolore shown below.
